port.title: Backend port
port.description: Port where the service is running on the backend

frontend-custom_domain.title: Custom Domain
frontend-custom_domain.description: Custom Domain to use for the website

frontend-server-alias.title: Server Alias
frontend-server-alias.description: Server Alias List separated by space

frontend-type.title: Backend Type
frontend-type.description: Type of slave. If redirect, the slave will redirect to the given url. If zope, the rewrite rules will be compatible with Virtual Host Monster

frontend-path.title: Backend Path
frontend-path.description: Path to proxy to in the backend

frontend-default-path.title: Default Path
frontend-default-path.description: Provide default path to redirect user to

frontend-https-only.title: HTTPS Only
frontend-https-only.description: If set to true, http request are redirect to https

frontend-ssl-proxy-verify.title: Verify Backend Certificates
frontend-ssl-proxy-verify.description: If set to true, Backend Certificates are checked

frontend-ssl_proxy_ca_crt.title: SSL Backend Authority's Certificate
frontend-ssl_proxy_ca_crt.description: SSL Certificate Authority of the backen (to be used with ssl-proxy-verify)

frontend-enable_cache.title: Enable Cache
frontend-enable_cache.description: If set to true, the cache is used

frontend-disable-no-cache-request.title: Disable 'no-cache' requests
frontend-disable-no-cache-request.description: If set to true, no-cache control headers will be disabled

frontend-disable-via-header.title: Disable 'Via' headers from cache
frontend-disable-via-header.description: If set to true, via headers will be disabled

frontend-prefer-gzip-encoding-to-backend.title: Prefer gzip Encoding for Backend
frontend-prefer-gzip-encoding-to-backend.description: If set to true, if a request is made with accept encoding 'gzip', only that one will be transferred to the backend

frontend-disabled-cookie-list.title: Disabled Cookies
frontend-disabled-cookie-list.description: List of Cookies separated by space that will not be sent to the backend
